lines.line: Ever felt like the world was closing in on you?
When tears are all you have left.
When everything you built comes crashing down.
And all that remains is the aftermath of disaster.
But inside that pain lies a choice.
Or you can prepare to rise.
To stand tall and show your strength.
To escape the flames of your past.
And stride confidently toward your future.

parsed_script.full_script: Ever felt like the world was closing in on you? When tears are all you have left. When everything you built comes crashing down. And all that remains is the aftermath of disaster. But inside that pain lies a choice. You can stay down. Or you can prepare to rise. To launch yourself into action. To rebuild stronger than before. To stand tall and show your strength. To escape the flames of your past. And stride confidently toward your future. Your comeback story starts now.
